title: Team assignment from bib colors (A/B) with confidence + smoothing
scope: Derive Team A/B from bib colors for each tracked player with a confidence score.
Apply temporal smoothing and hysteresis to prevent flicker.
When uncertain, handle low-confidence explicitly without silently guessing (emit Unknown + diagnostics).
acceptance: Each player present record includes team ∈ {A,B,Unknown} and team_confidence ∈ [0,1] (Unknown when confidence is below an explicit threshold).
Smoothing reduces flicker; configuration is explicit and deterministic.
Diagnostics include evidence and smoothing state for auditability.

deliverables.title: Bib-based team assignment module
acceptance: Team assignment produces A/B decisions with confidence and stable smoothing.

subtasks.title: Implement bib evidence extraction and smoothing policy.
done_when: Team A/B assignment is emitted with confidence on player present records.
Low-confidence handling is explicit in diagnostics.
